title: Page 4
content: I open the black wood box, and I feed the letters to the fire, one by one. It hurts, but I can bear it. Because I am a doll, and a servant. Because I am a pretty thing and a soldier all the same.

book.title: The Tailor (The Grisha #1.5)
book.description:
Storyline: 
 New scene from Shadow and Bone told from Genya's point of view.
book.author: Leigh Bardugo
